Author: violetferns
Text: Amenorrhea due to anorexia is *usually* not permanent and will reverse within \~ six months of reaching a "healthy" weight, so they probably just thought it would sort itself out eventually. Then again most doctors I've had the displeasure of dealing with just dgaf unless your insurance shits gold.  I know it's frowned upon to self diagnose but the only way I've ever been able to get shit done is by reading up on my symptoms and then asking  ***f i r m l y***  to be tested for XYZ. In your case, they'd start with a blood test to *-hopefully-* rule out menopause.
